pullrequest.title: Static camera when following a model

content.raw:
I'm experiencing a crash:

1. Open an empty world and insert a box

1. Right-click and "Follow"

1. Orbit or zoom the user camera - crash. Backtrace:

~~~
gzclient: /usr/include/OGRE/OgreAxisAlignedBox.h:264: void Ogre::AxisAlignedBox::setExtents(Ogre::Real, Ogre::Real, Ogre::Real, Ogre::Real, Ogre::Real, Ogre::Real): Assertion `(mx <= Mx && my <= My && mz <= Mz) && "The minimum corner of the box must be less than or equal to maximum corner"' failed.

Program received signal SIGABRT, Aborted.
0x00007ffff6895cc9 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:56
56	../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c: No such file or directory.

    function=0x7ffff5ec05a0 <_ZZN4Ogre14AxisAlignedBox10setExtentsEffffffE19__PRETTY_FUNCTION__> "void Ogre::AxisAlignedBox::setExtents(Ogre::Real, Ogre::Real, Ogre::Real, Ogre::Real, Ogre::Real, Ogre::Real)") at assert.c:101

I'm experiencing a crash:

  1. Open an empty world and insert a box

  2. Right-click and "Follow"

  3. Orbit or zoom the user camera - crash. Backtrace:
